category_subtitle: Super Bowl LX ‚Äî Seahawks vs Patriots ‚Äî Kickoff 6:30 ET

rounds.pro_tip: GRASS PATTERNS: Real stadium turf shows mowing lines, cleat marks, and natural color variation. AI grass is often impossibly uniform or has repeating patterns.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî Super Bowl halftime stage with pyrotechnics (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: PYROTECHNICS: Real fireworks and stage pyro have random spark trails and smoke. AI pyrotechnics look like symmetrical star shapes or solid glowing blobs.
CROWD INDIVIDUALITY: In real crowd shots, every face and body is unique. AI crowds often repeat the same 3-4 face templates with slight variations.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî football players mid-tackle at the line of scrimmage (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: HANDS & GRIP: Look at how players grip the ball or each other. AI often generates physically impossible hand positions, extra fingers, or merged appendages.
SCOREBOARD TEXT: Real scoreboards display coherent, formatted information. AI scoreboards show garbled numbers and nonsense team abbreviations.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî Vince Lombardi Trophy gleaming under spotlights (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: SILVER REFLECTIONS: The Lombardi Trophy's silver surface should reflect its real surroundings. AI metal often has generic environment map reflections that don't match the scene.
STADIUM ARCHITECTURE: Real stadiums have consistent structural elements ‚Äî uniform seat rows, regular beam spacing. AI arenas sometimes have warped geometry.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî Super Bowl watch party in living room with big TV (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: TV SCREEN CONTENT: Check what's on the screen. AI TVs often show blurry, nonsensical imagery that doesn't look like real broadcast footage.
LIGHTING TEMPERATURE: Real indoor/outdoor transitions show warm vs cool light. AI sometimes applies a single color temperature to the entire scene regardless of light sources.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî military jet flyover above stadium during anthem (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: JET TRAILS: Real vapor trails are affected by wind and humidity. AI jet trails are often perfectly parallel lines that look painted in the sky.
